          returns true if the two rectangles have intersected
 boolean removeBox(Bound s)
          removes a bounding box entirely from the collider
 void setActive(Bound s)
          sets the bound to active unless it's a ghost
active bounding boxes check all other boxes for collisions
 void setGhost(Bound s)
          sets the bounding box to ignore all collisions
 void setPassive(Bound s)
          sets the bounding box to passive.
 void setSolid(Bound s)
          makes the bounding box able to detect collisions again
 void setUpdateThreshold(long thresh)
          sets the threshold determining how frequently we check for more collisions
 void update()
          check new collisions and call onCollision or onCollisionEnd accordingly
new collisions are checked only if the elapsed time is greater than update threshold

init

public void init()
initializes the collider

addBox

public boolean addBox(Bound s)
adds a new bound to the collider by default, it's set to active.

Parameters:
s - the bound to add
Returns:
true if the bounding box did not previously exist

removeBox

public boolean removeBox(Bound s)
removes a bounding box entirely from the collider

Parameters:
s - the bounding box
Returns:
true if the bounding box existed in the collider

setPassive

public void setPassive(Bound s)
sets the bounding box to passive. Collisions with passive bounding boxes are only detected if they collide with an active bounding box
i.e. 2 passives won't know they've collided with each other

Parameters:
s -

setActive

public void setActive(Bound s)
sets the bound to active unless it's a ghost
active bounding boxes check all other boxes for collisions

Parameters:
s - the bounding box

setGhost

public void setGhost(Bound s)
sets the bounding box to ignore all collisions

Parameters:
s - the bounding box

setSolid

public void setSolid(Bound s)
makes the bounding box able to detect collisions again

Parameters:
s - the bounding box

update

public void update()
check new collisions and call onCollision or onCollisionEnd accordingly
new collisions are checked only if the elapsed time is greater than update threshold

getBoxes

public java.util.Iterator<Bound> getBoxes()
returns an iterator for the bounding boxes handled by this collider

Returns:
an iterator for the bounding boxes handled by this collider
